QuestData.Title: Disillusioned Defector
QuestData.Description:
The atmosphere in the city has improved little, but we may find this to our advantage today.
Silgryn asks for you at the Terrace. It seems even Elisande's forces are fleeing before her insanity.
A defector has risen from the ranks and seeks to join our cause.
See that this individual is well received, $n. We need all the friends we can get during these dark times.
